channel.title: Good Super Clean Source
channel.description:
[Request] Source & Client 449+
I want a source that 449 or higher, I don't want it with anything modified, at all. I just want a clean source, I've looked around and I can't find one. I want a clean source because I'm fed up of using badly modified versions of sources with messy code, terrible naming conventions and a ton more of bad habits which set my OCD off. I hope this doesn't sound too aggressive, but I've been so agitated seeing all this horrible code.
Thanks for reading. - Alex

item.title: Good Super Clean Source
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Convert Hyperion to the protocol you’re looking for, or add it to Apollo.

That’s the best you’re going to get unless you write your own.

edit typo.

Read full topic

item.title: Good Super Clean Source
item.dc:creator: @Teem_Rocket Teem_Rocket
item.description:
@Teem_Rocket wrote:

I believe there’s a 474 source on The Website of Who’s Name Shall Never Be Spoken Here. It isn’t very well done or clean though. You probably aren’t going to find what you’re looking for with those standards, especially in a revision higher than 317.

Read full topic
